product_name: The North Face RDT Rain Jacket - Men's
long_description: The lightweight, waterproof RDT Rain Jacket from The North Face features FlashDry(TM) technology for maximum breathability during your fast pursuits in wet weather. FlashDry fabric additive dramatically improves drying time and breathability without adding weight or bulk or washing out. HyVent(R) 2.5-layer polyester shell is seam sealed, waterproof, windproof and breathable. Pit zips let you vent excess heat buildup instantly. Polyurethane front zipper is backed by a stormflap for weather protection. The North Face men's RDT Rain Jacket features an adjustable hem and cuff tabs to seal out weather. One of the zippered hand pockets offers a media port.
short_description: The lightweight, waterproof RDT Rain Jacket from The North Face features FlashDry(TM) technology for maximum breathability during your fast pursuits in wet weather.
